channel.title: Documentation on Mainroad
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Mainroad

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Welcome 2023 the Mainroad theme document. This quick start guide covers Mainroad theme installation and minimal configuration and is intended for intermediate to advanced users. To understand this guide, you need to be familiar with the Hugo static site generator.

item.title: Customization
item.description: Customization page2 describes common Mainroad configuration parameters which can be specified via configuration file or via Front Matter section. That includes logo section tuning, adding a sidebar with widgets, adjusting highlight color, and more.

item.title: Frequently asked questions (FAQ)
item.description: Browse this FAQ page to find answers to frequently asked questions that have not been covered elsewhere in the documentation.
